meanings.definition: Inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: Stomatitis can make it painful to eat.
meanings.sent2: The dentist diagnosed her with stomatitis after examining her mouth.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds funny, stomatitis can be quite uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her mouth felt like a battleground during the stomatitis flare-up.
meanings.sent5: The redness and swelling of stomatitis were hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by sores or ulcers in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed medication to treat her stomatitis.
meanings.sent2: Stomatitis can be caused by various factors, including infections.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her stomatitis made her look like a vampire with all the sores.
meanings.sent4: The emotional pain of stomatitis was as real as the physical discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The persistent nature of stomatitis made her worried about her oral health.
